item.description:
Â 

Last minute meet up walk to 2 sweet little local bogs on this not too hot day.

Time is flexible if you want to change time to be able to come.

Arlington Rd is very short st going south off of Heath St (do not confuse with

Arlington Rd south of transfer station; that Arlington Rd is off of newton St)
item.how_to_find_us: lost pond at end of arlington rd off of Heath St Brookline Ma; just west of Hammond Pond Pkwy, South of Rte 9
item.name: flash hike: bogs of brookline
